text: @piersmorgan It is nothing to do with leadership & everything to do with the selfish arses that think the lockdown does not apply to them. That they are somehow immune from Covid19 & immune from spreading it ... People are behaving in an ignorant & selfish fashion. It is beyond sad ☹️
